text: ilgob gaeui haneul-eul changjohasigo jigulobuteo geuwa yusahan geos-eul changjohasin bun-i hananim-isila. (hananim-ui) myeonglyeong-i geu(haneulgwa jigu) saie naelyeooni, sillo hananimkkeseoneun modeun geos-i ganeunghan bun-isimyeo sillo hananimkkeseoneun modeun geos-eul jisig-eulo auleugo gyesim-eul geudaedeul-i aldolog hagi wiham-ila
